lead_paragraph: Human Rights Watch says a Syrian police photographer’s archive includes images of at least 6,786 detainees who died in the Assad government’s custody.

headline.main: Syrian Families Look Through Photos of the Dead for Relatives Lost in Government Custody
headline.print_headline: Syrian Families Look Through Photos of the Dead for Relatives Lost in Government Custody

snippet: Human Rights Watch says a Syrian police photographer’s archive includes images of at least 6,786 detainees who died in the Assad government’s custody.
